main.name: Tyler J. Small
main.description: I am a problem solver, coder, and hacker
main.bio: I am currently a senior at The University of Tennessee Knoxville for a bachelors in computer science. I work at Knoxville Utilities Board as an intern for web development. The software I work with at KUB includes Ember.js, Java web services, and PeopleSoft. In my own time I like to work with Python, and C/C++. Specifically, I enjoy writing code for machine learning, artificial intelligence, biology, robotics, and general scientific programming.

resume.skillmessage:
My main interests are scientific programming, artificial intelligence, and robotics.
    However, I am skilled in many different languages and libraries.
    The following is a list of the most relevant ones along with a skill level gauge for each.

education.description: Introduced me to software development with C/C++. Focused on artificial intelligence, scientific programming, and security.
